MentalHospitals.name: Better Help
MentalHospitals.description: The world's largest therapy service. 100% online.

MentalHospitals.name: Talkspace
MentalHospitals.description: Online therapy with licensed therapists via text, audio, and video.

MentalHospitals.name: National Alliance on Mental Illness (NAMI)
MentalHospitals.description: Provides advocacy, education, support, and public awareness so that all individuals and families affected by mental illness can build better lives.

MentalHospitals.name: Mental Health America (MHA)
MentalHospitals.description: Dedicated to addressing the needs of those living with mental illness and to promoting the overall mental health of all Americans.

MentalHospitals.name: 7 Cups
MentalHospitals.description: Free, anonymous, and confidential text chat with trained listeners and therapists.

MentalHospitals.name: Crisis Text Line
MentalHospitals.description: Free, 24/7 support for those in crisis. Text with a trained crisis counselor.

MentalHospitals.name: Psychology Today
MentalHospitals.description: Find a therapist, psychiatrist, support group, or treatment facility.

MentalHospitals.name: Headspace
MentalHospitals.description: Meditation and mindfulness app to improve mental well-being.

MentalHospitals.name: Calm
MentalHospitals.description: App for sleep, meditation, and relaxation.

MentalHospitals.name: Substance Abuse and Mental Health Services Administration (SAMHSA)
MentalHospitals.description: Provides information on mental health and substance abuse treatment services.

MentalHospitals.name: National Institute of Mental Health (NIMH)
MentalHospitals.description: The lead federal agency for research on mental disorders.

MentalHospitals.name: Suicide Prevention Lifeline
MentalHospitals.description: Provides free and confidential support for people in distress, prevention, and crisis resources.

MentalHospitals.name: Sanvello
MentalHospitals.description: On-demand help for stress, anxiety, and depression. A mobile app offering therapy, coaching, coping tools, and more.

MentalHospitals.name: Teen Line
MentalHospitals.description: Provides support, resources, and hope to young people through a hotline of professionally trained teen counselors.

MentalHospitals.name: The Trevor Project
MentalHospitals.description: Provides crisis intervention and suicide prevention services to LGBTQ+ youth.

MentalHospitals.name: Jed Foundation
MentalHospitals.description: A nonprofit that protects emotional health and prevents suicide for teens and young adults.

MentalHospitals.name: Anxiety and Depression Association of America (ADAA)
MentalHospitals.description: Provides information on prevention, treatment, and management of anxiety, depression, and related disorders.

MentalHospitals.name: Depression and Bipolar Support Alliance (DBSA)
MentalHospitals.description: Provides hope, help, support, and education to improve the lives of people who have mood disorders.

MentalHospitals.name: National Eating Disorders Association (NEDA)
MentalHospitals.description: Supports individuals and families affected by eating disorders and serves as a catalyst for prevention, cures, and access to quality care.

MentalHospitals.name: Rape, Abuse & Incest National Network (RAINN)
MentalHospitals.description: The nation's largest anti-sexual violence organization.
